name: Atmospug, the Cloud Jumping Dog
description:
148apps.com "Atmospug is a typical auto-runner/jumper at times, but with a fun twist."
Read more: http://www.148apps.com/reviews/atmospug-review/#ixzz3S0DXNxJr

LITTLE KNOWN FACT: Pugs can jump on clouds! (take our word for it, PLEASE don’t test the theory)

That’s lucky for our friend, Atmospug, the Cloud Jumping Dog since an evil horde of cats and the worst thunderstorm in years have both decided to pay a visit to the neighborhood.

Get Atmospug to the safety of the dog house by cloud hopping past whatever obstacles the cats throw at you. But you better move fast, a cloud’s tendency to dissipate could drop you into the endless mob of angry cats waiting below.

FEATURES:

> New Endless Experience
Do you know what I hate about endless runners? They never end! Atmospug delivers a whole new endless genre, called a "Level Chain".
> Challenging Platformer
Get ready for a distinctive platforming experience that will test your skills and patience.
> Evil Horde of Cats
From UFFOs (Unidentified Flying Feline Objects) to cats swinging on clothesline, a gang of purr-fectly devilish feline foes stands in your way.
> Atmospheric Aid
No "pressure", but you will need to familiarize yourself with a variety of cloud types that can help or hinder your progress.
> Choose your own Adventure
You, the player, decides which level to add next in the first game that grows!

Atmospug, the Cloud Jumping Dog doesn't require an internet connection to play and is free but some optional in-game items such as extra lives, new levels and costumes are available to purchase. You can turn off these options by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.
